message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Let's see what you think.
You were too greedy, now it's my turn to be fair... or not
Okay, I'll take a little less. But we both need to be reasonable. Let's split it 70/30.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too excited
We're running out of time, let's be smart.  I'll take 55%, you take 45% - we both walk away with something.
